manipulators.description: Win+Shift+B opens private browser (may not work if Firefox already open)
Win+Shift+Return opens terminal with file manager (ranger not installed)
Win+D opens Spotlight (physical G key in Colemak)
Win+I volume up (physical U key in Colemak)
Win+O brightness up (physical semicolon in Colemak)
Win+J play/pause (physical Y key in Colemak)
Win+K next track (physical E key in Colemak)
Win+Y full screenshot to clipboard (physical J key in Colemak)

to.shell_command: networksetup -getairportpower en0 | grep On && networksetup -setairportpower en0 off || networksetup -setairportpower en0 on

defaults read com.apple.AppleMultitouchTrackpad Clicking | grep 1 && defaults write com.apple.AppleMultitouchTrackpad Clicking -int 0 || defaults write com.apple.AppleMultitouchTrackpad Clicking -int 1

manipulators.description: Ctrl+Shift+Left Arrow to Option+Shift+Left (select word left)
Ctrl+Shift+Right Arrow to Option+Shift+Right (select word right)
